channel.title: Urban Dance on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Urban Dance on Simba Tango

item.title: Urban dance
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ lrargerich Tango is and always was a very urban culture. The dance even more so. Sometimes visitors to Buenos Aires that are tango dancers somehow expect everybody they meet to be a dancer, and taxi drivers to know all the milongas by name. Not so. Even in Buenos Aires, tango dancing is very much a niche activity, and the world of the milongas is very small even in the great city with millions of inhabitants.
